医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究人员获得 390 万美元资助，用于评估电子烟口味对吸烟行为的影响美国食品和药物管理局 (FDA) 拨款 390 万美元，允许俄亥俄州立大学综合癌症中心烟草研究中心的研究人员评估电子烟口味对当前成年吸烟者吸烟行为的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Researchers-receive-2439-million-grant-to-evaluate-effects-of-e-香烟-flavors-on-smoking-behaviors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Researchers-receive-2439-million-grant-to-evaluate-effects-of-e-香烟-flavors-on-smoking-behaviors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=993b516c-4e89-4327-a4f9-5664e1c9eb08 Wed, 12 Jul 2023 07:31:59 -0400 Researchers receive $3.9 million grant to evaluate effects of e-cigarette flavors on smoking behaviors
大流行期间过量饮酒增加了酒精性肝病死亡率KFF 健康新闻分析发现，在 covid-19 大流行期间过度饮酒导致酒精性肝病死亡人数大幅增加，导致该病死亡的加州人比车祸或乳腺癌还要多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Excessive-drinking-during-the-pandemic-increased-酒精-liver-disease-death-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Excessive-drinking-during-the-pandemic-increased-酒精-liver-disease-death-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a60d03d2-e8ef-4aaa-b76b-6a3bad8cd0cf Wed, 12 Jul 2023 07:25:34 -0400 Excessive drinking during the pandemic increased alcoholic liver disease death rates
疫情调查旨在确定一系列食物中毒病例的共同暴露源《欧洲监测》发表的一篇新论文报告了一项调查结果，该调查旨在确定这群病例的共同暴露源，以帮助查明传染源的可能来源，从而促进控制措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Outbreak-investigation-aims-to-identify-the-common-source-of-exposure-for-a-cluster-of-food-poisoning-cases。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Outbreak-investigation-aims-to-identify-the-common-source-of-exposure-for-a-cluster-of-food-poisoning-cases。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d985785-a2f2-4344-b95c-2cf48f684913 Wed, 12 Jul 2023 06:52:00 -0400 Outbreak investigation aims to identify the common source of exposure for a cluster of food poisoning cases
养狗对心血管疾病和糖尿病的好处是否也适用于美国退伍军人？一项研究发现，养狗可以降低美国退伍军人患心脏代谢疾病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Do-the-benefits-of-dog-ownership-on-cardioangio-disease-and-diabetes-extend-to-US-military-Veterans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Do-the-benefits-of-dog-ownership-on-cardioangio-disease-and-diabetes-extend-to-US-military-Veterans.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0973793-1572-468c-89b7-574f1388a4d2 Wed, 12 Jul 2023 06:18:00 -0400 Do the benefits of dog ownership on cardiovascular disease and diabetes extend to US military Veterans?
蜂蜜对人体健康有什么作用？研究人员回顾了有关食用蜂蜜对人类健康有益影响的现有数据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/What-effect-does-honey-have-on- human-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/What-effect-does-honey-have-on- human-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=97ec1469-e19b-41e3-93eb-ab95db4f2932 Wed, 12 Jul 2023 05:42:00 -0400 What effect does honey have on human health?
既往抗生素治疗是否会影响 COVID-19 的严重程度？研究人员确定频繁使用抗生素是否会增加 SARS-CoV-2 感染后不良后果（包括死亡）的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Does-previous-antibiotic-treatment-affect-COVID-19-severity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Does-previous-antibiotic-treatment-affect-COVID-19-severity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7455cf27-cad7-439b-9e34-aaa19013f526 Wed, 12 Jul 2023 05:15:00 -0400 Does previous antibiotic treatment affect COVID-19 severity?

年龄较大和某些健康状况会增加接受增强个体的 COVID-19 死亡风险研究人员在英格兰接受第二次加强剂量的成年人中确定了因 COVID-19 死亡风险较高的患者群体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Older-age-and-certain-health-conditions-increase-risk-of-COVID-19-death-in-boosted-individuals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Older-age-and-certain-health-conditions-increase-risk-of-COVID-19-death-in-boosted-individuals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0b005f61-7d84-4e6f-99d6-238971c6b20a Wed, 12 Jul 2023 04:10:00 -0400 Older age and certain health conditions increase risk of COVID-19 death in boosted individuals
